h2_title: Earth Wolf Miniboss Fight and Guide
content: Though it can often rise up on its hind legs to slash at you with its front claws, certain times its wild swings will make it crash forward to land belly up. After a moment it will thrash around and try to damage you if close, but with an exposed unarmored part of its body, you can try freezing it in place and expending a charged attack - preferably with the Smash or Pillar Style to slam down on its ribs for extra damage.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Earth_Wolf.md', within the main section titled 'Earth Wolf', specifically from the subsection 'Earth Wolf Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Though it can often rise up on its hind legs to slash at you with its front claws, certain times its wild swings will make it crash forward to land belly up. After a moment it will thrash around and try to damage you if close, but with an exposed unarmored part of its body, you can try freezing it in place and expending a charged attack - preferably with the Smash or Pillar Style to slam down on its ribs for extra damage.
